885660.name: Sim Racing Telemetry - MotoGP 18
885660.description:
With this module you will unlock the full and unlimited support for "MotoGP 18" (by Milestone) in Sim Racing Telemetry.

To use this module you must own a copy of "MotoGP 18" on a supported platform (PC, PS4, Xbox One) and follow the integrated instructions to record data.

To record data, both the computer running SRT and the PC/console running the game must be connected to the same network. The game and SRT can run on the same computer. SRT records only complete timed laps. Follow the integrated instructions (Help button in the Recording view) to configure the game and properly record telemetry data.

List of support parameters

  • Lap time invalid
  • World position
  • Velocity
  • g-force
  • Race position
  • Throttle
  • Steering
  • Gear
  • RPM
  • Tyre compound (F)
  • Tyre compound (R)
  • Clutch
  • Brake (F)
  • Brake (R)
  • Longitudinal body position
  • Suspension position (F)
  • Suspension position (R)
  • Wheel speed (F)
  • Wheel speed (R)
  • Wheel slip ratio (F)
  • Wheel slip ratio (R)
  • Wheel slip angle (F)
  • Wheel slip angle (R)
  • Tyre wear (F)
  • Tyre wear (R)
  • Brake temperature (F)
  • Brake temperature (R)
  • Slipstream effect
  • Wheel inertia factor (F)
  • Wheel inertia factor (R)
  • Tyre wearing enabled (F)
  • Tyre wearing enabled (R)

NOTE: DLCs on Steam are not transferable to other supported platforms (iOS, Android): digital stores are run by different companies and they don't allow us to transfer purchases made in other stores.

All product names, logos, registered trademarks and brands are property of their respective owners. All company, product and service names used are for identification purposes only. Use of these names, logos, and brands does not imply endorsement.
